string.name: Text00
string.value: Client Log Collection Consent Request for Game Optimization\n\n

string.name: Text01
string.value: In order to improve the performance of the game and investigate specific issues that could occur,\n

string.name: Text02
string.value: we would like to collect additional information about your PC environment.\n\n

string.name: Text03
string.value: We would like to collect information about your operating system, CPU, memory, and shader use.\n

string.name: Text04
string.value: In addition, we would like to also collect details about your current game status and account used.\n

string.name: Text05
string.value: This includes: frames per second, current map information, world, level\n

string.name: Text06
string.value: and job status of your character.\n

string.name: Text07
string.value: This information will only be used to help our teams investigate\n

string.name: Text08
string.value: when specific issues occur in your client.\n\n

string.name: Text09
string.value: Collecting this data should not cause any latency issues\n

string.name: Text10
string.value: or otherwise interfere with your normal game play.\n\n

string.name: Text11
string.value: Do you wish to consent to this data collection?\n

string.name: Text12
string.value: (You may change this selection anytime through the in-game Options menu.)
